creditline: Gift of James A. Bergquist, Boston
description: forest scene with men with spears, lantern and torch leading Jesus; man with dagger drawn standing with his PR foot on another man's PR arm--overcome man lying on ground; other figures in background
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

left edge near LLC, in the plate: [4]
provenance: [Probably Hartung & Hartung, Munich, May 7 , 2008, lot 3028]; [James Bergquist, Newton Center, Mass., until 2011; given to MIA]
signed: LLC, in the plate: [APPROPINQUAVIT JESU, UT / OSCULARETUR EUM Luc. XXII, 47.] and [1632 / Nicolas de Bruijn Inventor et Sculp]
title: The Capture of Christ, plate from "The Large Passion"
